text: @realDonaldTrump @narendramodi Remember, Vietnam only got 354 confirmed cases and 0 death from covid-19 despite being a neighbor to China. In fact, China’s neighbors are all doing great in dealing with covid-19, saving thousands of life. Comparing to U.S., it is now clear Trump lies and people dies!
